template.name: Halley Synology NAS Backup
template.description: Is the template for the service NAS Backup. Will contain only items for discover and monitor de NAS backup instances

discovery_rule.name: BACKUP: Backup tasks
discovery_rule.description: Discover backup tasks with the script from /var/log/remotelog/synobackup.sh

item_prototype.name: Backup "{#BPNAME}" status
item_prototype.description: Monitor the backup {#BPNAME} status and return date and task status. This backup is configured to be done every {$BPERIOD1}

trigger_prototype.expression: {str(Failed to run backup task,#1)}=1 or {str(Backup task was cancelled,#1)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Backup "{#BPNAME}" has an error
trigger_prototype.description: Backup "{#BPNAME}" has an error. Maybe the new backup was not done or has been completed with errors. Check the status of backup configured by Backup or HyperBackup utility NAS IP: {$NAS.IP} Backup "{#BPNAME}" is done every: {$BPERIOD1}
